name: unreported
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not reported to someone official, such as the police: go unreported These crimes often go unreported and don't show up in the police statistics. Another key priority is addressing illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing.
not reported on television, in newspapers, etc.: go unreported Many incidents go unreported in the national media. The country is in the grip of an unreported humanitarian disaster.
More examplesFewer examplesPeople-trafficking remains, for the most part, an unreported crime. The company disclosed previously unreported losses of more than £3 million.This is a scandal that has largely gone unreported. The most explosive finding of the committee went unreported in the American media.
